TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract serializable beforefieldinit ComplexObject extends System.Data.Objects.DataClasses.StructuralObject
Public MustInherit Class ComplexObject Inherits StructuralObject

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现复杂类型的基本功能。 implements the basic functionality for complex types. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [复杂类型对象](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/bb738472(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Complex Type Objects](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/bb738472(v=vs.100)). 使用概念模型实现自定义数据类时，建议表示复杂类型的数据类从继承 。When implementing custom data classes with a conceptual model, we recommend that your data classes that represent complex types inherit from . 有关详细信息，请参阅 [自定义对象](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/bb738612(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Customizing Objects](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/bb738612(v=vs.100)). 复杂类型可以是实体类型的属性或其他复杂类型的属性。A complex type can be a property of an entity type or of another complex type. 复杂类型由实体类型的非标量属性返回。Complex types are returned by non-scalar properties of entity types. 这样允许在实体内组织标量属性。This enables scalar properties to be organized within entities. 与实体相似，复杂类型由标量属性或者其他复杂类型属性组成。Like entities, complex types consist of scalar properties or other complex type properties. 不能在没有关联的实体类型的情况下使用复杂类型。A complex type cannot be used without an associated entity type. 因为复杂类型没有键，所以不能在没有关联的实体类型的情况下管理复杂类型对象。Because complex types do not have keys, complex type objects cannot be managed without an associated entity type. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [复杂类型对象](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/bb738472(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Complex Type Objects](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/bb738472(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 在下面的示例中，自定义数据类 `OrderInfo` 从继承， 并映射到 `OrderInfo` 在概念模型中定义的复杂类型。In the following example, the custom data class `OrderInfo` inherits from and is mapped to the `OrderInfo` complex type defined in the conceptual model. [!code-csharp[DP EntityObject Concepts#EntityObject](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DP EntityObject Concepts/CS/SalesObjects.cs#entityobject)] [!code-vb[DP EntityObject Concepts#EntityObject](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DP EntityObject Concepts/VB/SalesObjects.vb#entityobject)]

MemberSignature.Value: protected override sealed void ReportPropertyChanged (string property);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void ReportPropertyChanged(string property) cil managed
Protected Overrides NotOverridable Sub ReportPropertyChanged (property As String)

span.span: The name of the changed property.

summary.span: 通知更改跟踪器，某个复杂对象的属性已更改。

span.span: Notifies the change tracker that a property of a complex object has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当复杂类型由 Entity Data Model 工具生成时，在属性更改后将调用 方法，以将 中的缓存值作为属性的原始值提交。When a complex type is generated by the Entity Data Model tools, the method is called after a property change to commit the cached value in the as the original value of the property. 此方法调用更改跟踪器中的 方法。This method calls the method in the change tracker. 跟踪对自定义复杂对象的属性作出的更改时，必须调用 方法。When tracking changes that are made to the property of a custom complex object, you must call . 对于从 继承的复杂对象应采用此操作。Do this when the complex object inherits from .

MemberSignature.Value: protected override sealed void ReportPropertyChanging (string property);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void ReportPropertyChanging(string property) cil managed
Protected Overrides NotOverridable Sub ReportPropertyChanging (property As String)

span.span: The name of the changing property.

summary.span: 通知更改跟踪器，对复杂对象的属性更改挂起。

span.span: Notifies the change tracker that a property change is pending on a complex object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当复杂类型由 Entity Data Model 工具生成时，在属性更改前将调用 方法将属性的当前值缓存在 中，以便能够将此值用作该属性的原始值。When a complex type is generated by the Entity Data Model tools, the method is called before a property change to cache the current value of the property in the so that this value can be used as the original value for the property. 此方法调用更改跟踪器中的 方法。This method calls the method in the change tracker. 跟踪对自定义复杂对象的属性作出的更改时，必须调用 方法。When tracking changes that are made to the property of a custom complex object, you must call . 对于从 继承的复杂对象应采用此操作。Do this when the complex object inherits from .
